r.s: Creates DTA files containing money transaction data (Germany).
r.d: Payment_DTA provides functions to create DTA files used in Germany to exchange informations about money transactions with banks or online banking programs.
r.n: [-] Fixed bug #3165 (leading zero after comma in amount is ignored if more than two digits after comma). Thanks to Matthias C. Spie√?! [-] Fixed bug with corrupted DTA files if using only one line for transaction purposes. Thanks to Michael Hosse! ( [+] Added [-] Fixed [*] Improved [!] Note )
